name: trainpath-tweaker
title: Train Pathfinder Penalty Tweaker
author: MojoD
description: Simple mod which allows you change various train pathfinder penalties for various conditions.  Check MOD SETTINGS for setting the penalty values

name: DelticHonk
title: Deltic Honk
author: Michael Cowgill (ChurchOrganist)
description: blatant hack of Gotlag's original Honk mod which changes the sounds to Deltic horns. Trains honk when stopping. And starting. And on command.

name: naked-rails
title: Naked Rails
author: futileohm
description: Convert standard rails to naked rails, removing the gravel and/or sleepers. Can also change rails to rail remnants for a destroyed look.

name: Horns
title: Horns
author: TaxiService
description: Adds horns to cars and tanks. Honking can attract enemies in a tweakable radius.

name: Better-TrainHorn
title: Better Train Horn
author: Luc Mellee
description:
This mod is a updated version of Benjamin Lee's TrainHorn mod. Original Description: 
 Trains will now blare their horn after killing a player (sound by CrazyWashingtonianTrainNut on freesound)

name: VehicleSnap
author: Zaflis
description: Snaps movement angle when driving cars or tanks.

name: LightCone
title: Light Cone
author: darkfrei
description: Changes standart light cone of flashlight
